text: Stéphane Richard (born 24 August 1961) is the former chairman and CEO of Orange S.A.. Orange gives Stéphane Richard another 4 years as chief executive He graduated from HEC Paris and the École nationale d'administration. He studied at HEC Paris and École nationale d'administration in Strasbourg.Stéphane RichardMacron announces closure of elite school that hothoused French leaders He has also worked in politics with Christine Lagarde.Orange's Stephane Richard says wants 4th term as CEO - JDD == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Bordeaux
title: Stéphane Richard
